name: @ancplua/semconv-generator
description: Generate OTel Semantic Conventions for TypeScript, C#, and DuckDB

scripts.generate:all: npm run generate && npm run generate:package
scripts.build:package: npm run generate:package && cd output/OTelConventions && dotnet build -c Release
scripts.pack:package: npm run generate:package && cd output/OTelConventions && dotnet pack -c Release
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:dashboard && npm run deploy:sdk
scripts.validate:all: npm run validate:dashboard && npm run validate:sdk
scripts.ci: npm run generate:all && npm run validate:all
